Heading: French book trade returns conditions code
Note: Maintained by CLIL (Commission Interprofessionnel du Livre). Returns conditions values in <ReturnsCode> should be taken from the CLIL list

Heading: BISAC Returnable Indicator code
Note: Maintained by BISAC: Returns conditions values in <ReturnsCode> should be taken from List 66

Heading: UK book trade returns conditions code
Note: NOT CURRENTLY USED – BIC has decided that it will not maintain a code list for this purpose, since returns conditions are usually at least partly based on the trading relationship

Heading: ONIX Returns conditions code
Note: Returns conditions values in <ReturnsCode> should be taken from List 204
